text: Rihanna looked sensational at the Valerian premiere in Paris on Tuesday as she showed off her body in a pink bra with beads and a skirt. And a source told Hollywood Life on Friday that the 29 - year - old Diamonds crooner is fine with her look.'Rihanna is happy and feels sexy and more confident than ever with her new curves,'said a source.
